summary: A small project I'm working on to retexture some armor sets. Not trying to be lore friendly in any way, shape or form.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=6]A Retexture Pack[/size][/font][/center]Basically my first attempt at retexturing armors. I'm not trying to be lore friendly, so please don't bitch. Some of the armors I've changed so far are the Daedric, Dwarven, and Thieves guild. (My retexture for Dwarven is the one I'm most proud of.) If you like what you see, I'll most likely make more in the future. Thank you for your download.Â 
Oh, and most of these are for males. Sorry ladies.
author: Ronin
